metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4692 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An out-of-bounds write flaw was found in grub2's NTFS filesystem driver.This issue may allow an attacker to present a specially crafted NTFSfilesystem image, leading to grub's heap metadata corruption. In somecircumstances, the attack may also corrupt the UEFI firmware heap metadata.As a result, arbitrary code execution and secure boot protection bypass maybe achieved.

criterions.comment: grub2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
grub2-unsigned: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
grub2-signed: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
